Html:
Hello, this work
$objWorksheetres->setCellValue('D12','=SUM(D9:D11)');
$objWorksheetres->setCellValue('D21',$objWorksheetres->getCell('D12')->getCalculatedValue());

but

$objWorksheetres->setCellValue('D10',"=IFERROR(MATCH(C10,'Avance de usuarios'!Q2:Q20),0)"); // cell value = 20
$objWorksheetres->setCellValue('D22',$objWorksheetres->getCell('D10')->getCalculatedValue()); // return 0

no work, return 0

any help plz

thx

Hmm... It looks like the MATCH() function isn't working with PHPExcel's calculation engine although it is listed as implemented in the "PHPExcel Function Reference Developer Documentation".

Posting this in the issue tracker so Mark or Maarten can inspect:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=9748
